    Transformer Initializes the Piece List of the player depending on the mod chosen by the player at the start of the Game pre-condition Cards are not initialized post-condition Cards are initialized all with coordinates (0,0) to later be randomized

    void
    randomizePositions()
    Transformer: Randomizes the position of the player's pieces depending on if they are blue(top) or red (bottom) pre-conditions All pieces positions are set to (0,0) pre-conditions All pieces positions are set only ONCE at the begining of the round to random coordinates on the player's side

    • initCards

      public void initCards(int mode)
      Transformer Initializes the Piece List of the player depending on the mod chosen by the player at the start of the Game pre-condition Cards are not initialized post-condition Cards are initialized all with coordinates (0,0) to later be randomized
      Parameters:
      mode -

    • randomizePositions

      public void randomizePositions()
      Transformer: Randomizes the position of the player's pieces depending on if they are blue(top) or red (bottom) pre-conditions All pieces positions are set to (0,0) pre-conditions All pieces positions are set only ONCE at the begining of the round to random coordinates on the player's side
